# GraphQL DB Documentation

Welcome to the GraphQL DB documentation! This guide covers SQLAlchemy integration for building database-backed GraphQL APIs.

## Getting Started

New to GraphQL DB? Start here:

- **[Getting Started](getting-started/)** - Quick introduction and basic usage
- **[Models & Schema](models-schema/)** - Define database models for GraphQL

## Core Features

Learn about the key features:

- **[Pagination](pagination/)** - Relay-style cursor pagination
- **[Relationships](relationships/)** - Handle model relationships
- **[Performance](performance/)** - Query optimization and best practices

## Reference

- **[API Reference](api-reference/)** - Complete API documentation
- **[Examples](examples/)** - Real-world usage examples

## Prerequisites

GraphQL DB builds on [graphql-api](https://graphql-api.parob.com/). If you're new to GraphQL in Python, start with the graphql-api documentation to learn schema building basics.

## Need Help?

- Check out the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/parob/graphql-db)
- Report issues on [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/parob/graphql-db/issues)
